content: woodstone wrap this design features an intuitive lace panel surrounded by simple cable repeats on both sides the eight-row repeat makes this a wonderful choice for those who may be new to cables lace or both written instructions are included along with charts woodstone wrap © jenny gillard 2022 materials needles us 7 4 5mm 24 60 cm circular needles or size needed to obtain gauge yarn 3 skeins of estelle eco shetland worsted - 100% organic shetland wool - 100g = 300 yds 275 m 2 skeins of estelle alpaca whisper - 54% baby alpaca 24% mulberry silk 22% super-kid mohair - 50g = 437 yds 400 m colour caramel gauge 18 sts x 26 row in stockinette stitch = 4 x 4 10cm x 10cm after blocking size 14 x 68 35cm x 172cm after blocking notions cable needle 4 stitch markers abbreviations k - knit p - purl c4f - slip 2 sts onto cable needle and hold in front of work knit the next two stitches on the left needle then knit the two stitches from the cable needle this creates a left-leaning cable c4b - slip 2 sts onto cable needle and hold in back of work knit the next two stitches on the left needle then knit the two stitches from the cable needle this creates a right-leaning cable k2tog - knit 2 sts together ssk - slip slip knit yo - yarn over pm - place marker sm - slip marker special techniques right twisted stitch t2r - knit two stitches together leaving the stitches on the left needle insert the right needle between the stitches just worked and knit the first stitch again slip both stitches off the left needle together here is a helpful video tutorial by the chilly dog twisting two stitches - t2r and t2l plain url https //youtu be/rvunqphvfra 1 setup working with both strands of yarn held together cast on 80 stitches using the long-tail cast on method knit 7 row in garter stitch knit every row ws next row k5 p1 pm k1 p2 k1 p2 k1 p8 k1 p2 k1 p2 k1 pm p9 k2 p2 k2 p9 pm k1 p2 k1 p2 k1 p8 k1 p2 k1 p2 k1 pm p1 k5 now follow the written instructions or the charted instructions on pages 3 and 4 written instructions rs row 1 k6 sm p1 k2 x2 p1 k8 p1 k2 x2 p1 sm k3 k2tog k4 yo p2 yo k2tog p2 yo k4 ssk k3 sm p1 k2 x2 p1 k8 p1 k2 x2 p1 sm k6 ws row 2 k5 p1 sm k1 p2 x2 k1 p8 k1 p2 x2 k1 sm p9 k2 p2 k2 p9 sm k1 p2 x2 k1 p8 k1 p2 x2 k1 sm p1 k5 rs row 3 k6 sm p1 t2r x2 p1 c4b c4f p1 t2r x2 p1 sm k2 k2tog k4 yo k1 p2 k2tog yo p2 k1 yo k4 ssk k2 sm p1 t2r
